setIfAddressCanSign(address,bool).details: Will revert with ZeroAddress if the zero address is passed

params._canSign: Whether the given address will be able to sign work or not

setSwapper(address).details: Will revert with ZeroAddress if the zero address is passed

work(bytes,bytes).details: Will revert with: NotAKeeper if the caller is not a keep3r SignerCannotSignWork if the address who signed the message cannot sign work InvalidNonce if the nonce is invalid DeadlineExpired if the deadline has expired InvalidChainId if the chain id is invalid SwapperCallFailed if the call to the swapper failed

canAddressSignWork.return: If it can sign work or not

returns._0: If it can sign work or not

DeadlineExpired().notice: Thrown when a user tries to execute work with an expired deadline

InvalidChainId().notice: Thrown when a user tries to execute work with an invalid chain id

InvalidNonce().notice: Thrown when a user tries to execute work with an invalid nonce

NotAKeeper().notice: Thrown when a non keep3r address tries to execute work

SignerCannotSignWork().notice: Thrown when a user tries to execute work but the signature is invalid

SwapperCallFailed().notice: Thrown when a user tries to execute work but the call to the swapper fails

ZeroAddress().notice: Thrown when one of the parameters is a zero address

ModifiedAddressPermission(address,bool).notice: Emitted when signing permission is modified for an address

NewKeep3rSet(address).notice: Emitted when a new keep3r is set

NewSwapperSet(address).notice: Emitted when a new swapper is set

canAddressSignWork(address).notice: Returns whether the given address can sign work or not

nonce().notice: Returns the nonce to use when calling `work`

setIfAddressCanSign(address,bool).notice: Sets whether the given address can sign work or not

work(bytes,bytes).notice: Takes an encoded call to execute against the swapper contract, and executes it
